channel.title: [317]Some questions [I'm beginner][317]
channel.description:
Hey everyone!!! I have some questions for you again and I expect your answers :) P. S. I'm using 317 DeltaScape server...
1. How to change home area? ( I mean the area where you appear when you log in the game first time ) 2. How to add shops to your new home area? 3. How to make or delete commands like ::pkarmour ( I don't like commands what gives you free items :( ) 4. How to make NPCs shout? I used this tut http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440101.0.html but I can't find this npcs[i].getnextnpcmovement() or anything like this in my NPCHandler.java
That's all for now falks. Please help me :)

item.title: [317]Some questions [I'm beginner][317]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“morterdestroyer, post:3, topic:352658”] changing home…the command is probly ::home so what u need to do is…
1.client.java in ur source and ctrl F and search “home” with the "s So itll look like “home”.
2. itll find “home” and the teleportToX = will be the x co-ords. if u want ur home to be in vorrock it would be
teleportToX = 3210;
teleportToY = 3424;
u can download a co-ord list for help on that.
2. adding / deleting commands. open up ur client.java and search a command like pkgear or xrichie you should see if (command.startsWith(“pkgear”) && playerRights >=2. this is the difficult part. to delete that command what u want to delete is highlight the “if” the whole way down to the next “if” on another command. DO NOT DELETE THE SECOND “IF” u only delete all the things after the first “if” and before the last “if” goodluck[/quote]Dude please stay outta the help section. Some of them will work, but after reading that you make yourself look like a dumbass

  1. client.java, search the coords you get when you first login and change them
  2. too complicated, look up some guides and there a re a few videos on youtube
  3. search the command and delete the code. (The code ends with a “}” and starts with an “if”)
  4. Search guides, you’r lacking the use of the search button.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Some questions [I'm beginner][317]
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

changing home…the command is probly ::home so what u need to do is…
1.client.java in ur source and ctrl F and search “home” with the "s So itll look like “home”.
2. itll find “home” and the teleportToX = will be the x co-ords. if u want ur home to be in vorrock it would be
teleportToX = 3210;
teleportToY = 3424;
u can download a co-ord list for help on that.
2. adding / deleting commands. open up ur client.java and search a command like pkgear or xrichie you should see if (command.startsWith(“pkgear”) && playerRights >=2. this is the difficult part. to delete that command what u want to delete is highlight the “if” the whole way down to the next “if” on another command. DO NOT DELETE THE SECOND “IF” u only delete all the things after the first “if” and before the last “if” goodluck

Read full topic
